description_html: Matisse is a minimal collection ideal for hospitality and commercial projects. The value-driven seating is at home in a variety of applications from poolside to balconies. Special attention to durability includes mesh encased articulated foam cushions ideal for high traffic areas and a powder coated aluminum frame. The frame’s mesh walls aid in keeping costs—and weight—down, while offering a dependable product to be installed outdoors for use year over year. The lightweight nature of the construction allows for versatility in customizing spaces requiring flexible seating arrangements, as well as ease in reconfiguring the modular sofa to suit varying needs.
